title: Minutemen - Double Nickels On The Dime [1984]
description:

Minutemen - Double Nickels On The Dime [1984]
Label: SST Records  
Catalog#: SST CDEX 028  
Format: CD
 
Country: US 
Genre: Rock  
Style: Alternative Rock, Punk  
Credits: Bass, Vocals - Mike Watt 
Drums - George Hurley 
Guitar, Vocals - D. Boon 
Producer, Engineer - Ethan James  
Notes: Remastered CD version; does not contain LP tracks "Mr Robot's Holy Orders", "Ain't Talkin Bout Love", or "Little Man With A Gun In His Hand".
